body: Have you look at the assembly generated for this part? I'd like to be sure that we don't do the `d + Vec::size > dim_size` comparison at every iteration. It might be better to just have this loop until `dim_size - (dim_size % Vec::size)` and then an epilogue that will process last `dim_size % Vec::size` elems.
